A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible story line with unsatisfying character development. the \"space chase\" was laughable. Space cruisers that have to be gassed up like Ford Vans? The action / battle scenes were hokey and predictable. No light sabre fight...boo! I would rank this the worst Star Wars movie. Been a fan since I saw the original in theatres as a kid. Take everything you know and like about Star Wars and throw it out the window with this flick...that's not a good thing
